snippet: The Positive Influence league, whose season is restricted to summer because space at nearby school gyms is booked by adult leagues, provides an outlet for teenagers on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Positive Influence, a summer youth basketball league that operates from playground behind Manhattan's Lincoln Center, has ended its season; league will not meet again until next summer as indoor space nearby at school gyms is booked by adult leagues; league provides outlet for teenagers living on Upper West Side.
lead_paragraph: The Positive Influence league, whose season is restricted to summer because space at nearby school gyms is booked by adult leagues, provides an outlet for teenagers on the Upper West Side.

headline.main: A Basketball League Whose Success Isn’t Measured in Points
headline.print_headline: A Basketball League Whose Success Isn’t Measured in Points
